title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1002.3 - Books and records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 1002.3 - Books and records

State Regulations

An applicant shall agree to establish and maintain, and if
approved the applicant-borrower shall establish and maintain, appropriate books
and records conforming with generally accepted accounted procedures and
principles as required and approved by the fund. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
1002.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
